info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 02 at 8:31PM EDT by NWS Columbia
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Lincoln and McCormick Counties through 915 PM EDT... At 831 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Lake Strom Thurmond, or 14 miles southwest of Abbeville, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... McCormick, Mccormick County Airport, Lake Strom Thurmond, Bobby Brown State Park, Bradley, Hickory Knob State Resort Park, Gill`s Point, Bordeaux, Hester`s Ferry Campground, Broad River Campground, Mount Carmel, Baker Creek State Park, Leroy`s Ferry Recreation Area, Willington, Mount Carmel Park, Chennault and Long Cane Creek Picnic Area. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
